title: Strong rooms, bank lockers, safe deposit vaults, laundry room, Radio / laser therapy, post mortem room, mortuary, medical shop and cold storage for hospital building etc
clause_text: Strong rooms, bank lockers, safe deposit vaults, laundry room, Radio / laser therapy, post mortem room, mortuary, medical shop and cold storage for hospital building etc. Commercial use in first basement in case of shopping centre / shopping malls.
section: Following uses shall be permissible and counted in FSI.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Strong rooms, bank lockers, safe deposit vaults, laundry room, Radio / laser therapy, post mortem room, mortuary, medical shop and cold storage for hospital building etc.
